official_title: A Community-based Cervical Cancer Prevention Program in Kenya: Overcoming Obstacles to Care, Promoting Understanding of HPV Natural History
inclusion_criteria:
* Kenyan girls ages 9 through 14,
* willing to sign informed consent to be vaccinated
* are able to return for the second HPV vaccine dose.
* Kenyan women between the ages of 30 to 55 years
* willing to sign informed consent to be vaccinated
* are able to travel to the Webuye Clinic for VIA.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 9 Years
Must have maximum age of 55 Years
